biotools.summary: A set of simple linear inequalities derived from the geometry of contigs on the line, can be used to predict the relative positions and orientations of contigs from individual mate pair reads and thus produce a contig digraph.

bioschemas.name: SLiQ
bioschemas.summary: A set of simple linear inequalities derived from the geometry of contigs on the line, can be used to predict the relative positions and orientations of contigs from individual mate pair reads and thus produce a contig digraph.
